thread.title: Sheep in baaaa-d situation seeks shearer
thread.title_full: Sheep in baaaa-d situation seeks shearer

title: Sheep in baaaa-d situation seeks shearer
text:
RSPCA urgently seeks sheep shearer news.com.au RSPCA urgently seeks sheep shearer news.com.au The RSPCA is urgently searching for a shearer to attend to a sheep it found near Canberra. A WILDLY overgrown sheep has been found in the ACT and desperately needs a trim. 
RSPCA ACT put a call-out for a shearer to help it shave the woolly merino, which it rescued near Canberra today. 
RSPCA ACT chief executive Tammy Ven Dange told news.com.au that the organisation found the sheep near the Mulligans Flat area after a public tip-off last week. Other Stories
